title.narrative: Restoring safely-managed drinking water services for vulnerable populations in the DPR of Korea, including those affected by TC Lingling

description.narrative: The main objective of this multi-sector project is to provide life-saving water, sanitation and hygiene assistance to vulnerable communities affected by Tropical Cyclone Lingling in North Hwanghae, South Hwanghae and South Hamgyong provinces of DPRK. UNICEF will use CERF to provide sufficient water for drinking, cooking and personal hygiene to 50,900 people and carry out emergency repairs of damaged water supply systems to ensure access to safe water; this will be coupled with the distribution of hygiene items and hygiene promotion activities targeting an additional 35,000 children in nurseries and kindergartens. The project will be implemented in six months.
